original_text: As for the rest of the beasts, their dominion was taken away, but their lives were prolonged for a season and a time.
korean_text: 그 남은 짐승들은 그의 권세를 빼앗겼으나 그 생명은 보존되어 정한 시기가 이르기를 기다리게 되었더라

sentences.original_text: As for the rest of the beasts,
but their lives were prolonged for a season and a time.
sentences.korean_translation: 그들의 생명은 한 때와 한 기간 동안 연장되었습니다.
